returnValues.name: videoRef
returnValues.description: The ref that must be attached to the <video> element.

returnValues.name: isActive
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if the video is currently in PiP mode.

returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: Indicates if the current browser environment supports the PiP API.

returnValues.name: enter
returnValues.description: Requests the browser to move the video into a PiP window.

returnValues.name: exit
returnValues.description: Closes the PiP window and returns the video to the page.
